name: Holodance
description: Punch orbs with your hands, deflect projectiles with laserblades, shoot drones with guns or dance with dragons, using native songs, player created osu! beatmaps or any song from your local music library - in the most advanced VR rhythm game.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX GeForce 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX GeForce 980 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
